mapper.sql: tbtitle_id, title, created, updated, clicknum, category_id, audit_status, userid, cause, user_type
mapper.select: select tbtitle_id as tbtitleId , title, created, updated, clicknum, category_id, audit_status, userid, cause, user_type from tb_title where audit_status="2" and title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%') AND user_type=#{userType}

distinct
,
from tb_title
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.insert: insert into tb_title (tbtitle_id, created, updated, clicknum, category_id, audit_status, userid, cause, user_type, title) values (#{tbtitleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clicknum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into tb_title
tbtitle_id,
created,
updated,

userid,

mapper.update:
update tb_title
tbtitle_id = #{record.tbtitleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
clicknum = #{record.clicknum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_id = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_status = #{record.auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cause = #{record.cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{record.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update tb_title set tbtitle_id = #{record.tbtitleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clicknum = #{record.clicknum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_id = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_status = #{record.auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cause = #{record.cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{record.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_title set created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clicknum = #{clicknum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cause = #{cause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tbtitle_id = #{tbtitleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t.`tbtitle_id`,t.`title`,t.`created`, t.`updated`,t.`clicknum`,t.`category_id`, t.`audit_status`,t.`userid`,t.`cause`, t.`user_type` FROM tb_title t WHERE category_id = 67 ORDER BY clicknum DESC LIMIT 0,20
SELECT * FROM tb_title WHERE audit_status='2' AND updated BETWEEN #{olddate7} AND #{nowdate} order by clicknum desc
